AtkChrId.Wiki: The character ID to define the attacker parameters for.

DefChrId.Wiki: The character ID to define the defender parameters for.

PadType.Wiki: The operation type for the throw.

AtkEnableState.Wiki: The state type in which the attacker may perform the throw.

DefEnableState.Wiki: The state type in which the defender may perform the throw.

isFaceToFace.Wiki: If ON, attacker and defender face each other.

isMoveAttacker.Wiki: If ON, this throw will move the attacker.

DisableTurn.Wiki: If ON, this throw will disable turning for the defender.

ThrowAtkStateType.Wiki: The state type for the throw on the attacker's side.

ThrowDefStateType.Wiki: The state type for the throw on the defender's side.

Dist.Wiki: The maximum distance the throw is allowed to occur at. In metres.

ValidAngF.Wiki: The angle to the front that is valid for thowing in. In degrees.

ValidAngB.Wiki: The angle to the back that is valid for thowing in. In degrees.

DiffAngMin.Wiki: The minimum angular difference range between own direction and opponent's direction. In degrees.

DiffAngMax.Wiki: The maximum angular difference range between own direction and opponent's direction. In degrees.

MoveDist.Wiki: The movement distance when the throw attaches the attacker and defender together.

upperYRange.Wiki: The throw will not proceed unless the relative distance of the Y-axis from the attacker to the defender is less than this value.

lowerYRange.Wiki: The throw will not proceed unless the relative distance of the Y-axis from the attacker to the defender is above this value.

behaviorJudgeId.Wiki: The behavior judgment ID to use for this throw.
